title: Every Laptop Should Have A Knob! - ASUS Zenbook UX5400 & ProArt H5600
description: Get $25 off all pairs using offer code shortcircuit at   ASUS sent us two laptops; the ASUS Zenbook UX5400 for everyday work needs and the ASUS ProArt H5600 for the creators out there. The ProArt is rather interesting with a rotary knob, which honestly is something we hope we see more in the future!  Check out the ASUS Zenbook 14X at   Buy ASUS ProArt Studiobook H5600 On B&H (Paid Link):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
